Articles.Content:
Would anyone be up for model texturing? I'm pretty new to modding KSP but good enough to make my own parts.

If you'd like to contact me then add me on Steam: =CGP= Barack Oshizzle

Cheers!
I think you should show the model you want textured.

The headless mobs that are fan communities are rarely enticed by secrecy; be public about what you've got and what you want and you're more likely to find somebody who's interested in working with you; much more likely than finding that one person who wants to be part of your conspiracy.
